<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Grafana folder by UID</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v1/grafana/api/folders/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns a single folder by UID.
Make sure the region in the URL matches your account's region.


## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"path","name":"uid","required":true,"description":"The UID of the folder","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Folder details

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem schema={{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"updated"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined}
